trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O representante de AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler está definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>usando atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>objeto fornecido para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento para definir o identificador de anônimo para um valor personalizado.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>propriedade durante o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, um <xref:System.Guid>é usado.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento é gerado somente quando é a identificação anônima <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>Definindo o elemento de configuração `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
